Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: PROCEDURES FOR MONITORING THE USE OF GRANT FUNDS INSIDE THE UNITED STATES
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.ReturnReference: SCHEDULE I, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 2
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: THE FOUNDATION PROVIDES SCHOLARSHIPS AND HOUSING STIPENDS TO LCC STUDENTS AND OTHER FUNDS TO LCC DEPARTMENTS. GENERALLY FUNDS ISSUED TO DEPARTMENTS ARE BILLED TO US WITH DOCUMENTATION OF EXPENSES VIA FOUNDATION CHECK REQUEST. FOR SCHOLARSHIPS THE FOUNDATION SENDS THE LCC FINANCIAL AID DEPARTMENT A LIST OF RECIPIENTS. THE FINANCIAL AID DEPARTMENT APPLIES THE SCHOLARSHIPS TO THE STUDENT'S ACCOUNT AND BILLS THE FOUNDATION FOR THOSE SCHOLARSHIPS THAT PAY OUT ON A QUARTERLY BASIS. STUDENTS MUST MEET THE CRITERIA FOR THEIR SCHOLARSHIP IN ORDER FOR THE SCHOLARSHIP TO PAY. THE CRITERIA FOR THE SCHOLARSHIPS ARE ENTERED BY FINANCIAL AID INTO THEIR SOFTWARE AT THE TIME OF APPLYING THE SCHOLARSHIP TO THE STUDENT'S ACCOUNT SO THAT THE PROCESS OF APPROVING THE SCHOLARSHIPS FOR PAYMENT IS AUTOMATED AND NOT SOMETHING THAT NEEDS TO BE MONITORED. THE FOUNDATION RECONCILES THE BILLING FROM LCC BACK TO THE ORIGINAL LIST OF RECIPIENTS WHICH IS MAINTAINED IN EXCEL AND IN THE RAISER'S EDGE DATABASE. HOUSING STIPENDS ARE ADMINISTERED BY LCC AND BILLED TO THE FOUNDATION AT THE END OF SPRING TERM.

SCHOLARSHIPS AND HOUSING STIPENDS PROVIDE FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE FOR TUITION, BOOKS AND ROOM & BOARD FOR STUDENTS WHO ATTEND LCC AND IN SOME CASES FOR LCC GRADUATES WHO HAVE CONTINUED ON AT FOUR YEAR INSTITUTIONS. THE GILMA GREENHOOT AND THE KAPPY EATON/HITES FOUNDATION SCHOLARSHIPS ARE EXAMPLES OF SCHOLARSHIPS THAT PAY BENEFITS TO LCC GRADUATES. THE FOUR YEAR INSTITUTION WILL RECEIVE A CHECK FROM US WITH A LETTER THAT DETAILS THE REQUIREMENTS OF THE SCHOLARSHIP AND REQUEST THAT ANY UNUSED FUNDS BE RETURNED TO US IN THE EVENT THE STUDENT DOES NOT MEET THE MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS OR FAILS TO ATTEND THE ENTIRE ACADEMIC YEAR. PAYMENTS TO THE COLLEGE INCLUDE FACULTY SUPPORT WHICH IS USED TO COVER THE COST OF FACULTY SALARIES FOR PROGRAMS SUPPORTED BY DONORS SUCH AS ENERGY MANAGEMENT SUPPORTED BY EWEB AND THE NURSING PROGRAM SUPPORTED BY PEACEHEALTH. PAYMENTS TO THE COLLEGE ALSO INCLUDE REIMBURSEMENT FOR THE COST OF CONSTRUCTION AS IN THE CASE TO THE LONGHOUSE, KLCC AND THE NEW HEALTH & WELLNESS BUILDING. PAYMENTS FOR PROGRAM SUPPORT PROVIDE ASSISTANCE WITH THE COST OF SPECIAL PROGRAMS SUCH AS THE HIGH SCHOOL CONNECTIONS PROGRAM, SPECIAL PROJECTS SUCH AS THE RENOVATIONS TO HEALTH PROFESSIONS CLASSROOMS AND LABORATORY, OR EVENTS SUCH AS THE SUMMER MUSICAL OR THE PEACE CONFERENCE. EQUIPMENT AND OTHER SUPPLIES AND EXPENSES MAY ALSO BE PROVIDED FROM FUNDS ESTABLISHED FOR THAT PURPOSE SUCH AS THE PURCHASE OF SOFTWARE FOR OSBDCN, COMPUTER EQUIPMENT FOR BDC OR EVEN UNIFORMS FOR ATHLETIC PROGRAMS.

GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION IS A CHARITABLE CORPORATION FORMED TO ENCOURAGE AND INVOLVE THE COMMUNITY IN FURTHER DEVELOPING EDUCATIONAL OPPORTUNITIES BY AUGMENTING THE FACILITIES AND FUNCTIONS OF LANE COMMUNITY COLLEGE.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: EXPLANATION ON VOLUNTEERS AND TYPES OF SERVICES OR BENEFITS
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE SERVICES PROVIDED BY VOLUNTEERS INCLUDE SPECIAL EVENT ACTIVITIES, BOARD OF TRUSTEE SERVICE, SCHOLARSHIP SELECTION, FINANCE AND INVESTMENT OVERSIGHT, STUDENT SPEAKERS AND DONOR STEWARDSHIP.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ORGANIZATION'S PROCESS USED TO REVIEW FORM 990
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE FORM WAS REVIEWED BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE PRIOR TO FILING.

THE FOUNDATION'S BYLAWS CONTAIN A CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY. EACH TRUSTEE RECEIVES A COPY OF THE BYLAWS IN THEIR INITIAL ORIENTATION TO THE BOARD. BOARD MEMBERS WILL BE ASKED TO DISCLOSE ANY ACTUAL OR PERCEIVED CONFLICTS OF INTEREST AND SIGN OFF ON AN APPROVED FORM ANNUALLY AFTER A SHORT PRESENTATION ABOUT WHAT CONFLICTS CAN ARISE.

UNDER THE AUTHORITY OF THE LANE COMMUNITY COLLEGE BOARD OF EDUCATION, THE PRESIDENT REVIEWS AND APPROVES MANAGEMENT COMPENSATION FOR THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR OF THE FOUNDATION, BOTH AT THE TIME OF INITIAL SALARY PLACEMENT AND EACH YEAR THEREAFTER. SALARIES ARE BASED UPON COMPARABILITY MANAGEMENT SALARY STUDIES.
ALL EMPLOYEES ARE REVIEWED BY LANE COMMUNITY COLLEGE

THE FOUNDATION SENDS ALL DONORS FOR THE YEAR AN ANNUAL REPORT WHICH INCLUDES FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. ANY INDIVIDUAL WHO WANTS A COPY OF THE ANNUAL REPORT OR AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENT WHETHER A CURRENT YEAR DONOR OR NOT, MAY REQUEST A COPY ON THE FOUNDATION'S WEBSITE OR BY PHONE. OTHER GOVERNING DOCUMENTS SUCH AS OUR ENDOWMENT POLICY, GIFT ACCEPTANCE POLICY, INVESTMENT POLICY OR BYLAWS WILL BE MADE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST. A NOTICE TO THIS EFFECT IS AVAILABLE ON THE FOUNDATION'S WEBSITE.
